events.message: The candidate has submitted their application for the software engineer position, demonstrating strong programming skills and relevant experience.
Reviewed the application and categorised it under the engineering department, focusing on roles related to software development and devops.
Assigned recruiter John Smith to the candidate to manage the hiring process and schedule subsequent screening and interview stages.
Conducted initial phone screening with the candidate, discussing software engineering background and confirming their interest in the developer role.
Candidate responded promptly expressing enthusiasm for the next step in the process and availability for a technical interview next week.
Scheduled the technical interview for the candidate on May 10th at 2 PM to assess software development and problem-solving skills in detail.
Candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating excellent coding skills and familiarity with devops tools.
Scheduled HR interview for May 13th to discuss cultural fit, benefits, and job expectations with the candidate.
HR interview completed; candidate expressed strong alignment with company values and a clear understanding of job responsibilities.
An official offer was proposed to the candidate, including details about salary, benefits, and start date options.
Candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and asked for a few days to consider the terms and finalize their decision.
Candidate accepted the offer enthusiastically and confirmed their start date, looking forward to joining the engineering team.
Initiated onboarding process with the candidate, including access set up, orientation schedule, and introductions to the engineering team.
Onboarding and hiring process successfully completed, candidate is officially onboarded as a software engineer with all systems in place.
